text: Excellent neighborhood Heartland primary school that focuses on providing students with holistic approach and social skills to equip them to be the future leaders and professional and productive citizens with moral values and positive attitude to life, rather than just the rat race for grades. Friendly caring warm skillful teachers and staffs both approachable and responsible. Friendly attentive cosy comfy welcoming ambience with plenty of greenery and healthy ingredients for bringing up future leaders..
Best school ever most experienced teachers and most disciplined students
It is fun but teacher are kind of strict

this school is rlly fun and nice!! Teachers make the lessons unique and special for us to learn and have fun at the same time :DD The programmes and activites are okok here. CCAS are very cool and fun too. Mrs yeo was honestly the best teacher!!

Great school I luv u mr aw. They also provide year books at the end of the year in recent years which is great. Plus, I got to feed the fishes (as a science leader). Overall, great school would highly recommend to parents
